abstract: Paul W Bergrin, federal prosecutor turned freewheeling defense lawyer, is charged with orchestrating 2004 murder of witness in Newark, NJ, who was to testify against one of his clients.
snippet: Paul W. Bergrin, a federal prosecutor turned freewheeling defense lawyer, is charged with orchestrating the 2004 murder of a witness who was to testify against one of his clients.
lead_paragraph: Paul W. Bergrin, a federal prosecutor turned freewheeling defense lawyer, is charged with orchestrating the 2004 murder of a witness who was to testify against one of his clients.

headline.main: Lawyer Defends Himself on Charges He Orchestrated Murder of a Witness
headline.print_headline: Lawyer Defends Himself on Charges He Orchestrated Murder of a Witness
headline.seo: Newark Lawyer, Paul Bergrin, Defends Himself in Murder Trial
